ygData.subject: Re: We Want You on Brell Serilis (special offer)
ygData.msgSnippet: Gotta agree here... I play on two servers, I level slow as hell, but I m having a great time. I still haven t quite decided what I want to do for my MA
ygData.messageBody:
Gotta agree here... I play on two servers, I level slow as hell, but I'm
having a great time. I still haven't quite decided what I want to do for
my MA character, but when I start her I will holler and getting up to
lvl 6 or so you can start to get off and play with the people around you
rather then worry about leveling slow as heck... = )

Beth -

Christina Norman wrote:
> I don't want to suggest to anyone that they leave their old server and
> friends, but it can be fun to be on multiple servers as well. If you're
> playing on some other server every night, having a great time, then multi
> server stuff may not be for you. If you find you're getting a little
> bored though, maybe trying out a fresh character on a fresh server might
> be fun.
